text.autoconfig.awesomesheepswell.title: Awesome Sheep Swell
fml.menu.mods.info.description.awesomesh: The wool thickens as the sheep eats grass, and you'll get more wool when sheared!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.awesomesh: The wool thickens as the sheep eats grass, and you'll get more wool when sheared!
